title: The 500th Episode
description:
Kumail Nanjiani, Bowen Yang, Michelle Buteau, Julio Torres, Franchesca Ramsey and Pete Holmes share hilarious true stories in the 500th Episode of RISK!

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Roy Eldridge, The Harry Breuer Orchestra, Michelle Buteau, Julio Torres, Franchesca Ramsey, Pete Holmes, Ben Talmi, Kevin Allison, Kumail Nanjiani, John LaSala, Bowen Yang, Sinkane, Jeff Barr)
